queries.metricSelector:
(
    kube_namespace_labels:filter(
        and(
            not(prefix(label_radix_app,"radix")),
            not(prefix(label_radix_app,"canarycicd")),
            eq(label_radix_env,"app"),
            in(
                "dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster",
                entitySelector("
                    type(kubernetes_cluster),
                    entityName(~"${DASHBOARD_CLUSTER_NAME}~")
                ")
            )
        )
    ):splitBy():sum:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10)
)

(
    builtin:synthetic.http.request.statusCode:filter(
        and(
            not(eq("Status code",SC_2xx)),
            in(
                "dt.entity.http_check_step",
                entitySelector("
                    type(http_check_step),
                    fromRelationships.isStepOf(
                        type(http_check),
                        mzName(RADIX),
                        entityName(~"Radix Services ${DASHBOARD_RADIX_ENV}~")
                    )
                ")
            )
        )
    ):splitBy():count:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10)
)

(
    builtin:synthetic.http.request.statusCode:filter(
        and(
            not(eq("Status code",SC_2xx)),
            in(
                "dt.entity.http_check_step",
                entitySelector("
                    type(http_check_step),
                    fromRelationships.isStepOf(
                        type(http_check),
                        mzName(RADIX),
                        entityName(~"Radix Services ${DASHBOARD_RADIX_ENV}~")
                    )
                ")
            )
        )
    ):splitBy("dt.entity.http_check_step"):sum:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10)
)

(
    radix_scenario_duration:filter(
        and(
            in(
                "dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster",
                entitySelector("
                    type(kubernetes_cluster),
                    entityName(~"${DASHBOARD_CLUSTER_NAME}~")
                ")
            ),
            eq(scenario,"Happy path")
        )
    ):splitBy():max:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10)
) / (60)

builtin:service.requestCount.total:filter(
    and(
        in(
            "dt.entity.service",
            entitySelector("
                type(service),
                fromRelationships.isServiceOf(
                    type(CLOUD_APPLICATION),
                    entityName.equals(~"ingress-nginx-controller~")
                ),
                toRelationships.isClusterOfService(
                    type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),
                    entityName.equals(~"${DASHBOARD_CLUSTER_NAME}~")
                ),
                not(
                    toRelationships.calls(
                        type(SERVICE),
                        toRelationships.isNamespaceOfService(
                            type(CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE),
                            entityName.startsWith(~"radix-~")
                        )
                    )
                )
            ")
        )
    )
):splitBy():sum:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10) / 60

builtin:service.requestCount.total:filter(
    and(
        in(
            "dt.entity.service",
            entitySelector("
                type(service),
                fromRelationships.isServiceOf(
                    type(CLOUD_APPLICATION),
                    entityName.equals(~"ingress-nginx-controller~")
                ),
                toRelationships.isClusterOfService(
                    type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),
                    entityName.equals(~"${DASHBOARD_CLUSTER_NAME}~")
                )
            ")
        )
    )
):splitBy():sum:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10) / 60

kube_node_status_condition:filter(
    and(
        in(
            "dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster",
            entitySelector("
                type(kubernetes_cluster),
                entityName(~"${DASHBOARD_CLUSTER_NAME}~")
            ")
        ),
        not(eq(condition,Ready)),
        eq(status,true)
    )
):splitBy():sum:auto:sort(value(sum,descending)):limit(10)
